abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may flip a coin. If heads, put this Pokémon onto your Bench and attach 3 different types of basic Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.effect: Does 20 more damage for each different type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
